## RumInitConfiguration.allowedTracingUrls property

A list of request URLs used to inject tracing headers. See \[Connect RUM and Traces\](https://docs.datadoghq.com/real\_user\_monitoring/platform/connect\_rum\_and\_traces/?tab=browserrum) for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
allowedTracingUrls?: Array<MatchOption | TracingOption> | undefined;
```
